biotools.summary: a new platform to analyze the molecular impact of Zika virus infection | ZIKV is a database that has been manually developed and cured by Brazilian researchers, experts in the fields of microbial infection and host-pathogen interaction, molecular biology, proteomics and neurochemistry. Our goal is to gather all information on gene expression alterations at mRNA and/or protein level promoted by Zika virus infection in different host models. The… | ZIKV is a database that has been manually developed and cured by Brazilian researchers, experts in the fields of microbial infection and host-pathogen interaction, molecular biology, proteomics and neurochemistry | The database provides information on genes which expression was experimentally measured after ZIKV infection
